alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 29 at 7:23AM EDT until March 29 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CDT WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Alabama and northwest Florida. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 10 AM CDT this morning. For the Wind Advisory, from 10 AM Wednesday to midnight CDT Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
